headline: How Strong Q3 Guidance and Share Buybacks Will Impact Steel Dynamics (STLD) Investors
summary: Earlier this week, Steel Dynamics announced third-quarter 2025 earnings guidance that surpassed consensus expectations, highlighting robust order backlogs and continued commissioning of its major aluminum and recycled slab facilities. The company also repurchased US$185 million in ordinary shares during the quarter, reflecting confidence in its operations amid ongoing industry expansion projects. We’ll explore how Steel Dynamics’ upbeat earnings guidance and active share repurchases may...
